ack.p: TB gratefully acknowledges funding of the Werner Siemens foundation for establishing the research field of Synthetic Biotechnology at the Technical University of Munich. DA and NM gratefully acknowledge funding by the Bavarian State Ministry for Environmental and Consumer affairs for funding of the project Resource efficient PHB production processes within the project consortium BayBioTech (TP7, TLK01U-69045, http://www.baybiotech.de/startseite/). The authors gratefully acknowledge HPLC sample analysis conducted by Mrs. Martina Haack.
